description:
Inuyasha and the gang meet Taromaru, the son of a village leader. They go to the Temple of the Water God, where children are being sacrificed. The Water God has a sacred treasure and toys around with the group.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le lac des ténèbres gouverné par le dieu de l`eau
O Lago da Escuridão controlado pelo Deus da Água
Suijin ga Shihai Suru Yami no Mizuumi
The Lake of the Evil Water God
水神が支配する闇の湖
